description: its the totally easy game but with bigger platforms and its waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay easier than the original so this one you can actually beat but it is baby edition so if you play this your a baby so juts remember that fact and if you forget the game will gladly remind you also go to kidocode to learn how to make games oh and by the way its not my game ITS OUR GAME
